typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Product
source(output(
		ProductDescriptionID as integer,
		Description as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductDescription
source(output(
		ProductModelID as integer,
		Name as string,
		CatalogDescription as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductModel
source(output(
		ProductModelID as integer,
		ProductDescriptionID as integer,
		Culture as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductModelProductDescription
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductCategory
Product, ProductCategory join(Product@ProductCategoryID == ProductCategory@ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProdAndProdCat
JoinProdAndProdCat, ProductModel join(Product@ProductModelID == ProductModel@ProductModelID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProdMod
JoinProdMod, ProductModelProductDescription join(ProductModel@ProductModelID == ProductModelProductDescription@ProductModelID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProductDesc
JoinProductDesc, ProductDescription join(ProductModelProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID == ProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProdModProdDesc
JoinProdModProdDesc select(mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name = Product@Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		ProductCategoryID = Product@ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID = Product@ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDate,
		ThumbNailPhoto,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName,
		rowguid = Product@rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = Product@ModifiedDate,
		ProductCategoryID = ProductCategory@ProductCategoryID,
		ParentProductCategoryID,
		Name = ProductCategory@Name,
		rowguid = ProductCategory@rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = ProductCategory@ModifiedDate,
		ProductModelID = ProductModel@ProductModelID,
		Name = ProductModel@Name,
		CatalogDescription,
		rowguid = ProductModel@rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = ProductModel@ModifiedDate,
		ProductModelID = ProductModelProductDescription@ProductModelID,
		ProductDescriptionID = ProductModelProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID,
		Culture,
		rowguid = ProductModelProductDescription@rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = ProductModelProductDescription@ModifiedDate,
		ProductDescriptionID = ProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID,
		Description,
		rowguid = ProductDescription@rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = ProductDescription@ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
JoinProdModProdDesc sink(input(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkProduct
